name: clickhouse-ts-typegen
description: CLI to generate TypeScript types from ClickHouse DDL (monorepo)

scripts.demo: pnpm -w build && mkdir -p demo && node packages/cli/dist/index.js testdata/simple/test.sql --out demo/types.ts --camel --emit-zod --emit-json-schema
scripts.demo:watch: pnpm -w build && mkdir -p demo && node packages/cli/dist/index.js testdata/simple/test.sql --out demo/types.ts --camel --emit-zod --emit-json-schema --watch
